item.title: Exploring OCI Registries: Chapter 2: Pull a Public Helm Chart
item.description: Aisha’s a Platform Engineer. As a platform engineer, every day, Aisha upgrades and rolls back helm charts. That’s an natural evolution from the time honoured IT tradition of turning it off and on again!
